Package ch.bailu.gtk.gsk

Interface BlendMode

public interface BlendMode

https://docs.gtk.org/

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    COLOR
    Creates a color with the hue and saturation of the source color and the luminosity of the destination color
    static final int
    COLOR_BURN
    Darkens the destination color to reflect the source color
    static final int
    COLOR_DODGE
    Brightens the destination color to reflect the source color
    static final int
    DARKEN
    Selects the darker of the destination and source colors
    static final int
    DEFAULT
    The default blend mode, which specifies no blending
    static final int
    DIFFERENCE
    Subtracts the darker of the two constituent colors from the lighter color
    static final int
    EXCLUSION
    Produces an effect similar to that of the difference mode but lower in contrast
    static final int
    HARD_LIGHT
    Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the source color value
    static final int
    HUE
    Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminosity of the destination color
    static final int
    LIGHTEN
    Selects the lighter of the destination and source colors
    static final int
    LUMINOSITY
    Creates a color with the luminosity of the source color and the hue and saturation of the destination color
    static final int
    MULTIPLY
    The source color is multiplied by the destination
    and replaces the destination
    static final int
    OVERLAY
    Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the
    destination color value.
    static final int
    SATURATION
    Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminosity of the destination color
    static final int
    SCREEN
    Multiplies the complements of the destination and source
    color values, then complements the result.
    static final int
    SOFT_LIGHT
    Darkens or lightens the colors, depending on the source color value

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final int DEFAULT
      The default blend mode, which specifies no blending
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MULTIPLY

      static final int MULTIPLY
      The source color is multiplied by the destination
      and replaces the destination
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SCREEN

      static final int SCREEN
      Multiplies the complements of the destination and source
      color values, then complements the result.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • OVERLAY

      static final int OVERLAY
      Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the
      destination color value. This is the inverse of hard-list
      See Also:
